mapper.select: SELECT id, connector_id, connectee_id, activate FROM CONNECTOR WHERE (connector_id = #{connectorId} AND connectee_id = #{connecteeId}) OR (connectee_id = #{connectorId} AND connector_id = #{connecteeId});
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONNECTOR (connector_id, connectee_id, last_visited_at, activate, created_at, updated_at) values (#{connectorId}, #{connecteeId}, NOW(), 1, NOW(), NOW())
